sendMessage(UUID, String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Network.RMIServer
allow to send message to the server. when the client wants send a message, he will simply call this method which will build a GameMessage and finally will insert it into the MessageManager queue

SocketInfoContainer - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Network
class containing all the information about the socket connection of a player SocketInfoContainer.socket: the socket object associated to the connection SocketInfoContainer.in: the scanner open on the inputStream of the socket, used to recive messages SocketInfoContainer.out: the PrintWriter open on the outputStream of the socket, used to send message
SocketInfoContainer(Socket) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Network.SocketInfoContainer
instanziate a new SocketInfoContainer.
SocketListener - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Network
network thread responsable of opening new socket connections, which will be used by SocketReaderThread to send and recive messages SocketListener.serverSocket: the ServerSocket object used to open new connections SocketListener.socketPlayerRegistry: ConcurrentHashMap which map for each client UUID the relative SocketInfoContainer object SocketListener.stop: flag used to stop the thread
SocketListener(int) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Network.SocketListener
the constructor perform the inizialization of the SocketServer on the port indicated and socketPlayerRegistry
socketListener - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Network.SocketReaderThread
 
SocketMsgConnection - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Client.Network
client-side network thread which handles the socket connection.
SocketMsgConnection() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Client.Network.SocketMsgConnection
 
socketPlayerRegistry - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Network.SocketListener
 
SocketReaderThread - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Network
network thread responsable of the management of socket connections.
SocketReaderThread(SocketListener) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Network.SocketReaderThread
inizialize the thread in oreder to make available all the socket connection opened
socketSendQueue - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Network.MessageManager
